quoteText: (e) DISCOGS DOES NOT PROMOTE OR CONDONE ANY IDEAS OR MESSAGES CONTAINED IN THE ITEMS LISTED VIA THE SERVICE.
title: Discogs does not condone any ideas contained in the items listed via the service

tosdr.case: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
tosdr.tldr: Discogs distances itself from any messages or ideas users include in the content they generate on the website.
